profile.name: Diogo Soares
profile.summary: Senior Product Manager and Business Analyst and anthropologist blending a deep understanding of human behavior with expertise in delivering impactful technology solutions across diverse sectors, including NGO, technology, healthcare, and marketing. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams, leveraging data-driven decision-making, and fostering collaborative environments to achieve strategic objectives and drive sustainable growth. Passionate about applying technology for social good and creating a more equitable and sustainable future.

description: Spearheaded the Product Management for a SaaS platform module focused on human-to-human customer service connected with WhatsApp and other communication channels.
Defined and owned the product roadmap, prioritizing features to drive business value and enhance the user experience.
Monitored key performance metrics (KPIs) related to the module, using data to inform product strategy and decisions.
Managed the integration of the platform with CRM, e-commerce, and ERP systems to ensure seamless customer journey and data flow.
Directed the creation and optimization of digital customer touchpoints, including websites, apps, and AI-powered chatbot flows.
Led automated marketing campaigns on email and WhatsApp to boost customer engagement.
Managed integrations with CRM, WhatsApp, e-commerce, and ERP systems.
Directed all the creation of websites, apps and AI-powered chatbot flows to improve customer conversations.
Built strong client relationships by turning their needs into clear system requirements.
Led the analysis, development, and implementation of a new budgeting system, streamlining the proposal process and increasing efficiency by 30%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to analyze, design, and implement technology solutions aligned with organizational needs.
Successfully developed and delivered a comprehensive training program for colleagues, enhancing team skills and knowledge transfer.
Conducted workshops and training sessions on emerging technologies, such as Artificial Intelligence, for over 30 colleagues.
Led the development and implementation of Take Blip's SaaS Chatbot Platform, collaborating closely with 8-10 cross-functional teams.
Successfully scaled the platform to handle millions of daily interactions, establishing Take Blip as a leading chatbot provider in Brazil.
Achieved a 25% increase in NPS for Dr. Consulta and a 30% improvement in CSAT for Itaú within the first year.
Integrated various authentication methods, including SMS, facial recognition, and voice recognition, ensuring secure access and data protection.
Achieved a 15% reduction in operational costs for XP Inc. while expanding market share through targeted feature enhancements.
Led the design and development of over 12 prototypes for new technology solutions, employing a user-centric approach.
Successfully implemented and monitored new business processes, including a streamlined proposal tracking system.
Demonstrated strong stakeholder management skills with clients including Vivo and Suvinil.
Consistently delivered high-quality projects on time and within budget, exceeding client expectations in 90% of projects.
Successfully managed the end-to-end execution of over 50 projects, encompassing digital transformation initiatives and content creation.
Led the digital transformation of Hospital Beneficência Portuguesa, resulting in a 50% increase in user engagement.
Implemented an advanced project management platform, integrating SAP for over 200 users, reducing project delivery times by 25%.
Collaborated on projects across multiple time zones, achieving a 20% increase in operational efficiency through global integration.
Led all digital projects at the agency as Digital Project Manager, specializing in website and e-commerce development.
Implemented agile methodologies, introducing sprints that accelerated delivery timelines.
Managed contract, budget, and financial expenses, maintaining project profitability with a consistent track record.
Successfully managed a diverse portfolio of over 100 digital events, spanning across 14 municipalities. Project: Litoral Sustentável.
Led and mentored a high-performing team, overseeing all project phases from strategic planning to performance monitoring.
Demonstrated expertise in managing digital communication channels, including websites and social media platforms.
Produced high-quality content, including over 50 video articles, newsletters, and social media posts.
